metadata.title: Report an action, monitoring or compensation for mitigation work on bat roosts
metadata.submissionGuidance: We’ll send you an email to let you know the outcome. You’ll usually get a response within 10 working days.

You must submit monitoring reports in the same calendar year the monitoring takes place
